p: The outbreak in 2016 started on March 29th (week 13 of 2016) and ended September 19th (week 37) involving 32 animals (Fig. 1). The herd size at the beginning of the outbreak was 2069 animals. The incidence of WA-MCF in 2016 was 1.5 (95% C.I. 1.1â€“2.2) cases per hundred animals per year (Additional file 1). The estimated direct losses to Kapiti Plains Ranch were estimated ~US$9600.
